amendment.description: To strike the prohibition on the use of appropriations by Amtrak to support routes on which deep discounts are available.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2856 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11405) To strike the prohibition on the use of appropriations by Amtrak to support routes on which deep discounts are available.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2856 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Specter.
